content: STMicroelectronics' family of cortex-M (and Cortex-A) based MCU and MPU devices. The STM32F4 and STM32H7 series are workhorses for embedded development â€” rich peripheral sets (ADC, DAC, timers, CAN, USB, Ethernet), mature tooling (STM32CubeMX, HAL drivers), and a massive community. firmware is typically C, compiled with GCC-ARM, and flashed via SWD/JTAG. cortex-M MCU peripheral firmware
